Class StartUpController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneralController
      • StartUpController

  • public class StartUpController
extends GeneralController
    this model will handle the events on the startup screen - if the user enters a valid username, they will be able to advance to the next screen to see their messages or create a channel

      this field stores the username the client enters in the startup screen

      • isValidUser

        public boolean isValidUser(java.lang.String username)
        this function will return whether the username entered is valid the username MUST NOT CONTAIN ANY COMMAS OR SPACES
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if valid, false if not
